INEXE RCISE of the powers contained in section 80 of the Animal
Health Act, 2010, the following Regulations are made:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health Title
(Notifiable Diseases) Regulations, 2019.
2. The diseases specified in the Schedule are the notifiable Liosft
diseases. notifiable
diseases
